title: WTB Collin, Baker “Collins easily safe” T202

posts.post_title: WTB Collin, Baker “Collins easily safe” T202
posts.post_content:
Hello all

I have the bug to add 1-2 cool T202 “only HOFer” cards to my collection and I’d love to add the Collins Easily Safe with both Eddie Collins and Home Run Baker on the same card

Please PM me if you have one to spare!

Thx

Jeff
